bug.author: maobaolong
bug.summary: copyFromLocal failed when use relative path, replace it to absolute path, it become successful.
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: master Describe the bug copyFromLocal failed when use relative path, replace it to absolute path, it become successful. To Reproduce bin/alluxio fs copyFromLocal LICENSE alluxio://192.168.31.120:19998/abc/
Failed to cache: Timeout waiting for response after 30000ms. (LocalFileDataWriter{request=block_id: 33554432 tier: 0 space_to_reserve: 8388608 medium_type: "" pin_on_create: false , address=WorkerNetAddress{host=192.168.31.120, rpcPort=52200, dataPort=52200, webPort=52199, domainSocketPath=, tieredIdentity=TieredIdentity(node=192.168.31.120, rack=null)}})
Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Urgency Describe the impact and urgency of the bug. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/maobaolong>@maobaolong</denchmark-link> was not able to reproduce this with current master.. <denchmark-code>Davids-MBP-2:alluxio david$ bin/alluxio fs copyFromLocal LICENSE /LIC Copied file:///Users/david/cleanspace/alluxio/LICENSE to /LIC``` </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/maobaolong>@maobaolong</denchmark-link> have you tried the latest master to see if the issue is resolved for you?
Closing this issue due to inactivity, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/maobaolong>@maobaolong</denchmark-link> feel free to reopen this if this is still an issue you observe.
